title: Jo Stevens – 2021 Comments on Racism in Cricket
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jo Stevens, the Shadow Digital, Culture, Media and Sport Secretary, on 26 November 2021.
content:
The report today is a reminder of previous ECB failures to get a grip on the racism scandal engulfing cricket.
